description.english: Accumulated a small fortune, but in an instant gone!
description.koreana: 소소한 재산을 모은 것이 한순간에 사라져 버리는구나!
description.schinese: 积累了小小的财富
description.japanese: 小さな財産を貯めたのに、あっという間になくなってしまいました!

description.english: Buy it! The world stops for you!
description.schinese: 购买它！世界为你停滞！
description.japanese: 買いて!世界はあなたのために停滞します!

description.english: Complete the Butterfly plot "Earth Bound Spirit?"
description.schinese: 通关蝴蝶剧情“地缚灵？”
description.japanese: 胡蝶劇情「地縛霊ですか?」

description.english: Clear the Butterfly plot "Death"
description.schinese: 通关蝴蝶剧情“阴阳永隔”
description.japanese: 胡蝶劇情「陰陽永遠に隔たれます」

description.english: Complete the butterfly plot "Monster?"
description.schinese: 通关蝴蝶剧情“妖怪？”
description.japanese: 胡蝶劇情「妖怪ですか?」

displayName.english: The struggle to break the cocoon

description.schinese: 通关蝴蝶剧情“第三者”
description.japanese: 胡蝶劇情「第3人」

description.japanese: 猫劇情「お金を略奪しますか?」

description.japanese: 猫劇情「宮中昔語り」

description.english: Complete the cat drama "Steal sex?"
description.schinese: 通关猫剧情“劫色？”
description.japanese: 猫劇情「略奪色ですか?」

description.english: Beat the Cat drama "Lost Chance"
description.schinese: 通关猫剧情“逝去的机缘”
description.japanese: 猫劇情「過ぎ去った機縁」

description.english: Clear the zombie drama "Search"
description.schinese: 通关僵尸剧情“搜查”
description.japanese: ゾンビドラマ「捜査」

description.english: Complete the zombie episode "The Doll About to Go Bust"
description.schinese: 通关僵尸剧情“即将破败的玩偶”
description.japanese: ゾンビ劇「壊れかけの人形」

description.english: Clear the Zombie episode "Wake Up"
description.schinese: 通关僵尸剧情“唤醒”
description.japanese: ゾンビ劇「ウェイクアップ」

description.english: Clear the zombie episode "Revenge Shoots"
description.schinese: 通关僵尸剧情“复仇的萌芽”
description.japanese: ゾンビ劇「復讐の芽」

description.english: Finish the game "What is your purpose?"
description.schinese: 通关青白蛇剧情“你们有什么目的？”
description.japanese: 青白蛇劇情「目的は何ですか?」

description.english: Clear the game in "The Green Snake"
description.schinese: 通关青白蛇剧情“青白蛇”
description.japanese: 青白蛇劇情「青白蛇です」

description.english: Clearance green white snake plot "husband?"
description.schinese: 通关青白蛇剧情“官人？”
description.japanese: 青白蛇劇情「恋人ですか?」

description.english: Clear "Love for 'Xu Xian'" in the episode of Green Snake
description.koreana: 통관 청백사 드라마 허선에 대한 사랑
description.schinese: 通关青白蛇剧情“对‘许仙’的爱”
description.japanese: 青白蛇劇情「許仙に対する愛です」

description.english: Clearance green white snake plot "brother-in-law?"
description.schinese: 通关青白蛇剧情“姐夫？”
description.japanese: 青白蛇劇情「お兄ちゃんですか?」

description.english: Clear "The Strong and the Fa Hai"
description.schinese: 通关青白蛇剧情“强者与法海”
description.japanese: 青白蛇劇情「強者と法海」

displayName.koreana: 요괴를 다스리는 사단과 요괴를 다루는 사단

description.english: Clear the battle of the Benders "Unshackled"
description.schinese: 通关御妖师剧情“解开束缚”
description.japanese: 御妖師劇情「束縛を解く」

description.english: Clear "Enemy" in Demon Benders

description.japanese: 御妖師劇情「難敵」

description.english: Clear "Ask Carefully" in Benders
description.schinese: 通关御妖师剧情“小心询问”
description.japanese: 御妖師劇情「御妖師のお題」

description.english: Clear the "Ring the Bell with the Soul" storyline
description.schinese: 通关御妖师剧情“以魂响铃”
description.japanese: 御妖師劇情「魂をもって鈴を鳴らします」

description.english: In the eyes of the moonlight monster, you are already rich.
description.koreana: 월광족 의 괴물로 볼 때, 너는 이미 한 나라에 견줄만큼 부자가 되었다.
description.schinese: 在月光族的妖怪眼里，你已经富可敌国。
description.japanese: 月光族の妖怪の目で、あなたはすでに富める敵国です。

description.schinese: 第一次通关蝴蝶A线模式1
description.japanese: 1回目クリアナックルAラインモード1です

description.japanese: 1回目クリア猫B線モード2です

description.japanese: 1回目クリアゾンビBラインモード2です

description.schinese: 第一次通关青白蛇A线模式2

description.schinese: 第一次通关御妖师A线模式2

description.japanese: 1回目のクリアお妖さんB線モード1です

description.english: Clear Benders B-Line Mode 2 for the first time
description.koreana: 첫 번째 마스터스 b 라인 모드 2를 통관한다
description.schinese: 第一次通关御妖师B线模式2
description.japanese: 1回目の御妖師B線モード2です

description.english: I saw the end of the demons
description.schinese: 见证了众多妖的结局的证明。
description.japanese: 多くの妖の結末を見てきた証です。

description.english: Witness Yingtai finally accompany Liang Sheng's side again
description.koreana: 마침내 영태가 다시 한 번 양생과 함께 하는 모습을 지켜보았다
description.schinese: 见证英苔终于再度陪伴于梁生的身边
description.japanese: 英苔がついに再度梁生の身の回りに付き添うことを目撃します

description.english: Witness the broken fantasy, leisurely butterfly, eventually miss
description.koreana: 산산조각 난 환상의 나비를 목격하고 끝내 놓쳐
description.schinese: 见证幻境的破碎，悠悠蝴蝶，终究错过
description.japanese: 幻の境の破砕を目撃して、悠々と蝶、結局見逃します

description.english: Witness the deception of the scroll
description.schinese: 见证画卷的骗局
description.japanese: 絵巻物の詐欺劇に立ち会います

description.english: Witness the contract with the butterfly, and the journey is never lonely
description.koreana: 나비와의 계약을 목격하고 나서 그 여행은 더 이상 외롭지 않게
description.schinese: 见证与蝴蝶的契约，自此旅途不再孤单
description.japanese: 蝶との契約を見て、旅は孤独ではありません

description.english: Your vows lead you to your death
description.koreana: 너의 서약은 너를 죽음으로 이끌 것이다
description.schinese: 你的誓言将你引入死亡
description.japanese: あなたの誓いはあなたを死に導きます

displayName.english: The departure of the Ying Tai

description.english: "I wish you happiness, though I hate it..."
description.schinese: “虽然不甘，但愿你幸福……”
description.japanese: 「悔しいですが、あなたが幸せであれば……」

displayName.japanese: 長くおつきあいします

description.english: Witness the reunion between LAN Fei and the cat
description.schinese: 见证了兰妃与猫的重逢
description.japanese: 蘭妃と猫の再会を見届けました

description.english: Witness the disappearance of the cat's soul
description.schinese: 见证了猫魂的消失
description.japanese: 魂の消失に立ち会いました

description.english: Witness the cat and the LAN Fei snuggle
description.koreana: 고양이와 난비가 서로 의지하는 모습을 보았다
description.schinese: 见证了猫与兰妃的相互依偎
description.japanese: 猫と蘭妃の姿を目撃しました

description.english: Witness the greedy wishing man
description.koreana: 탐욕스런 소원을 비는 사람의 얼굴을 보았다
description.schinese: 见证了贪婪的许愿人
description.japanese: 欲張りなお願い人を目撃しました

description.english: Witness the zombie girl emerge from her stasis
description.koreana: 좀비 소녀가 자신의 멍에서 깨어나는 모습을 지켜봤습니다
description.schinese: 见证了僵尸少女走出自身的郁结
description.japanese: ゾンビ少女が鬱屈した状態から抜け出すのを目撃しました

displayName.japanese: 暗闇に飲み込まれます

description.english: I witnessed the blackness of the maiden, and I was consumed by the darkness
description.koreana: 그 소녀가 검어지는 것을 보고, 자신도 어둠에 잠겼다
description.schinese: 见证了少女的黑化，自己也被黑暗吞噬
description.japanese: 少女の黒化を目撃し、自らも闇に飲み込まれます

description.english: Witnessed the destruction of the demon King's lair
description.schinese: 见证了妖王巢穴的覆灭
description.japanese: 妖王の巣の崩壊を目撃しました

description.english: You were never meant for each other
description.koreana: 너는 두 사람과 인연이 있는 사람이 아니다
description.schinese: 你并不是两人的有缘人
description.japanese: あなたは二人の縁のある人ではありません

description.english: Witness the girl let go of obsession, reincarnation
description.koreana: 소녀가 집착을 버리고 다시 윤회로 돌아가는 것을 보았다
description.schinese: 见证了少女放下执念，重入轮回
description.japanese: 少女が執着を捨て生まれ変わります

description.english: Witness your love with white double repair
description.schinese: 见证了你与白双修的爱情
description.japanese: あなたと白双修の愛を目撃しました

description.english: Witness the sincerity of green and white
description.schinese: 见证青与白的真心
description.japanese: 青と白の本気を確かめます

description.english: Witness the road of green cultivation for white
description.koreana: 청이 흰색을 위해 끊임없는 수행의 길을 지켜보다
description.schinese: 见证青为了白不断修行的道路
description.japanese: 青が白のために修行を続ける道を見届けます

description.english: Witness the love with the green, you become the green Fa Hai
description.koreana: 녹색과의 사랑을 목격하고, 당신은 녹색의법해가 되었습니다
description.schinese: 见证与青的爱情，你成为了青的法海
description.japanese: 青との愛情を目撃して、あなたは青の法海になりました

displayName.english: A reunion across time and space

description.english: To witness your reunion in the future
description.koreana: 너희들이 미래에서 다시 만날 것을 목격하다
description.schinese: 见证你们在未来的重逢
description.japanese: 皆さんの未来の再会を目撃します

description.english: Witness the future of Benders in the time warp
description.schinese: 见证时空隧道里御妖师的未来
description.japanese: 時空トンネルの御妖師の未来を見てきました

description.english: Witness the destruction of the village and the departure of the Benders
description.schinese: 见证村庄的覆灭与御妖师的离别
description.japanese: 村の滅亡と御妖師との別れを見届けます

description.english: A testament to your future with the Benders
description.koreana: 당신과 왕궁이 함께 하는 모습을 보았습니다
description.schinese: 见证了你与御妖师携手并进的未来
description.japanese: あなたと妖師の未来を見てきました
